comments.body:
(Sorry I missed this last time I looked.) Am I correct in thinking this is a shared library therefore anything that builds using it will also need it at runtime?

If so, it [should have a `run_export`](https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build/en/latest/source/resources/define-metadata.html?highlight=selectors#export-runtime-requirements) section. The `x.x.x` section should be changed depending on the expected ABI stability of the shared libraries:
```suggestion
  skip: true  # [win]
  run_exports:
    - {{ pin_subpackage('croaring', max_pin='x.x.x') }}
```
